import ButtonGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ButtonGroup'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from '../Context' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import logoN from "../assets/img/logoN.png" import img5 from "../assets/img/img5.jpg" const NavBar = ({filterCategory}) => { const{agregarCar, buscador, setBuscador, usu} = useContext (Context); const logout = () => setAuth (false) const total = agregarCar.reduce( (count) => count+1, 0); const seacher = (e) => { setBuscador(e.target.value) console.log (e.target.value) } return ( <>
{total} Mi perfil Cerrar sesión
Vestido
Enteritos Jardineras Pantalones
) } export default NavBar
